doc:
Michael Robbins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Robbins 0 Michael Anthony Robbins (14 November 1930 – 11 December 1992) was an English actor and comedian best known for his ongoing role as Arthur Rudge in the TV sitcom and film versions of On the Buses (1969–72). Michael_Anthony_Robbins ( 14_November_1930 – 11_December_1992 ) was an_English_actor_and_comedian best_known for his_ongoing_role as Arthur_Rudge in the_TV_sitcom_and_film_versions of On the_Buses ( 1969 – 72 ) .
